item.title: Eureka Forbes Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Eureka Forbes Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and raising concerns about the stock’s long-term strength amid underwhelming market performance. Time: 24 minutes ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Reveal Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has concluded for 4,083 stocks, revealing a nuanced picture of corporate performance across market capitalisations and sectors. While the proportion of companies reporting positive results has edged up slightly to 46.0%, the overall trend remains subdued, reflecting ongoing challenges in the broader economic environment. Time: 24 minutes ago

item.title: Ecos (India) Mobility & Hospitality Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Underperformance
item.description: Ecos (India) Mobility & Hospitality Ltd has recently touched a 52-week low, closing just 1.2% above its lowest price of Rs 160.95. This significant price level reflects a period of sustained underperformance relative to both its sector and broader market indices. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Indiabulls Limited Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.9.38 Amidst Weak Fundamentals
item.description: Indiabulls Limited, a key player in the Diversified Commercial Services sector, recorded a new 52-week low of Rs.9.38 today, reflecting ongoing pressures in both the company’s performance and broader market conditions.
